column1: HR, Management & OPS Teams - Binary Q&A (Y/N)
Does the employee's adhere to leave policies? (Example: providing sick leaves from different cities and before/after holidays)
Have you observed any instances where the employee has shown disrespectful communication or engaged in inappropriate behavior towards HR/OPS teams?
Have you observed any instances/suspicious activities or received reports suggesting that the employee has engaged in lying, forging timesheets or stealing goods?
Have you received any complaints or witnessed instances where the employee insulted or offended others or displayed aggression?
Was the employee punctual when working on tasks/roles that require interaction with customers, employees, or candidates?
